content: the bestie beanie is a cable stitch hat knitted in the round a 1x1 rib is worked to create a stretchy brim after which twists and braids alternate with a basket-weave pattern on either side of the decorative front panel the name comes from the fact that this was designed as a christmas present for a friend sizing this hat is made to fit a 23 head the best way to change the sizing if needed is to increase/reduce your cast on in sets of 4 adding/taking away 2 each from mirroring basket-weave sections this pattern is written out in its entirety for people who have trouble reading charts however the charts are included at the end note the charts are just for the main body of the hat- the decrease section is only written
